alert.note: Alert for Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 2:24AM AKST until December 24 at 11:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...East winds 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...Tanana Flats, and Nenana Hills and Nenana. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. Blowing snow will reduce visibility and cause snow drifts to form. Gusty winds could blow down trees and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds gusting to 45 mph will are occuring at Nenana and over the Nenana Hills. These winds will continue this morning and are expected to decrease Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats
